nodes.text: Chasuka was an edible green plant that was available as foodstuffs during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Pieces of chasuka greens often became stuck in the teeth of those who ate them. Chasuka was a favorite food of the Human combat medic Archiban Kimble, who was better known as Doc.

Chasuka is first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, in the message "Healthy teeth" from the Jedi Knight class's companion character Doc. Only female players who are pursuing a romance with Doc will receive the message.
